outputs.output_descr: The main objective of the project is to empower and transform the General Federation for NGOs & Foundations (GFNF) to an innovative, democratic, transparent and participatory organization that will be able to carry concerns of the NGOs to policy makers, as well as to achieve its modernization objective through the Reform of Regulation, as well as through Institutional Development, Capacity Building, and the establishment of Administrative and Financial Procedures. Further, the GFNF will be strengthened through the establishment of a Complaint Office, a Technical Coordination Office and a Volunteer Unit. Based on the best international standards, a transparent and accountable funding mechanism for NGOs will be identified as well.

project_title: Support to the General Federation for NGOs & Foundations
